data.title: Engineering, Technology, Management & Aviation
data.meta_description: At Vaughn College in Queens, NY we're committed to providing our students with an unparalleled educational experience and a career, guaranteed.
data.text:
Your Future Starts Here

Schedule Campus Tour

Join us for the Fourth Annual Vaughn Open Golf Outing Monday, September 30 at Dyker Beach Golf Course As one of our most important fundraising events of the year, the golf outing proceeds will fund a scholarship that will make the dream of an education possible for many of our students. The event will be held on Monday, September 30 at 10 a.m. at Dyker Beach Golf Course. We hope to see you on the golf course! Register Now

Vaughn College in the News As demand continues to soar for aviation professionals due to workforce shortages, Vaughn College is preparing the next generation of these professionals to fulfill the need. Check out all the recent news coverage from a variety of television networks. See media coverage

AT VAUGHN,

THE NUMBERS ARE STACKED IN YOUR FAVOR.

Vaughn is ranked #1 in upward mobility nationwide as reported in the “New York Times.”

of Vaughn grads—78% in their field—are employed or continue their education within one year.*

MORE THAN 90% OF STUDENTS RECEIVE

FINANCIAL AID

Not employed within one year? Vaughn will Reimburse a year's worth of federal Direct student loan payments. ††

BLOG

PSA Airlines Brings Mentorship and Career Opportunities to Vaughn Students

In episode 15 of Vaughn’s Futureproof Focus, Dr. Sharon B. DeVivo, president and chief executive officer of Vaughn College and host of the podcast, sat down with PSA Airlines executives Richard Ugarte, vice president of maintenance and engineering and Robert Bridges, maintenance supervisor, for an engaging conversation about helping Vaughn students to develop skills to […]

††For eligible full-time students. See the Vaughn Guarantee for details.

*Outcomes include data within one year of graduation for graduates who reported via survey. There were a total of 364 graduates in 2022. 222 reported an outcome for an 61% response rate. The 2022 graduating class includes September 2021, December 2021 and May 2022 graduates.
